subject: First Ever Poem
text:
Today’s the day where I sit and pray and hope you’ll come back to live another day
I no I’ve not meet you be needless to say, you mean a lot to me in every possible way.
It’s been 4weeks and I hardly heard a peak until tonight when you tell me you’re off in a week 
You tell me you have to, you tell me you’re sorry, you tell me not even to worry. 
You tell me this is your last goodbye, you tell me not cry.
I tell you I love you, I tell you I care, I tell I’ll always be here
I hope you come back not even for me but just for your family so they don’t have to grieve.
